item.title: All Gifties Locations (Version 1.10) In InfinityÂ Nikki
item.description:
The Golden Season has arrived and brought yet another Where are the Gifties challenge in Infinity Nikki . There are a couple of stray Gifties that Nikki needs to find if she wishes to help them return to Gifty Island. It's a time-limited event during the 1.10 update that usually lasts throughout the season and players can obtain many useful rewards like diamonds and growth materials.

The following article is still a work in progress.

Where To Find Where Are The Gifties Challenge In Infinity Nikki

To get some clues about where to start looking for Gifties, you need to enter the challenge page. To find it, open the events menu and look for the Golden Season tab. There are many options to choose from, but look for the Time to Collect event. Press it and choose the Where are the Gifties challenge to start the event.

The Where are the Gifties event is available from September 28 until October 27 during the Golden Season update in Infinity Nikki . You won't be able to complete it immediately as each Gifty unlocks after a certain number of days alongside its clue. So, there is no way to find out where they are beforehand. Login daily to find the lost Gifties and make sure not to skip any of them to avoid missing out on some of the rewards. Nikki will also get extra Diamonds once all the cute yellow creatures are found.

All Gifties Locations During The Golden Season In Infinity Nikki

Golden Waves Of Wheat Gifty Location

  • Reward: 30 Diamonds, 80 Shiny Bubbles, 35 Shining Particles, 5 Glimmer Threads.

In the Abandoned District, teleport to Beside the Golden Fields Warp Spire and head southwest to find two abandoned houses surrounded by stacks of hays. Approach one of the doors to find the Golden Waves of Wheat Gifty location in Infinity Nikki .

Afternoon Brew Tasting Gifty Location

  • Reward: 30 Diamonds, 80 Shiny Bubbles, 35 Shining Particles, 5 Glimmer Threads.

To find the Afternoon Brew Tasting Gifty location, fast-travel to Beside the Ripple Wine Cellar Warp Spire walk east along the dirt path. The area is large and full of Pieceys, so it might get confusing. Approach the big barrel next to the two pumpkins on top of the stacks of hays, and go around it to see the Afternoon Brew tasting Gifty.

Gifty Location #3 (Unlocks After 1 Day)

TBA

Gifty Location #4 (Unlocks After 2 Days)

TBA

Gifty Location #5 (Unlocks After 3 Days)

TBA

35

item.title: How To Build Flins In Genshin Impact - Best Weapons, Artifacts, And Constellations
item.description:
Flins is a playable Electro character in Genshin Impact . As a unit from Nod-Krai, Flins also has the ability to transform an Elemental reaction into a Lunar reaction. When Flins or his team trigger Electro-Charged, it will transform into a Lunar-Charged reaction, just like Ineffa in Genshin Impact . Of course, to get the most out of what Flins can offer, here's Flins' best build in Genshin Impact , including Flins best weapons, artifacts, and constellations .

Flins Build Overview In Genshin Impact

Weapons

  1. Bloodsoaked Ruins
  2. Staff of the Scarlet Sands
  3. Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
  4. Staff of Homa
  5. Vortex Vanquisher
  6. Ballad of the Fjords
  7. Deathmatch

F2P Weapons

  1. Prospector's Shovel
  2. Missive Windspear
  3. The Catch
  4. Dragon's Bane
  5. Blackcliff Pole

Artifact Sets

  • Night of the Sky's Unveiling

Stats

  • Timepiece: ATK
  • Goblet: ATK or Electro DMG
  • Circlet: Crit Rate or Crit DMG

Substats

  • Crit DMG
  • Crit Rate
  • ATK%
  • Elemental Mastery

Best Flins Weapons In Genshin Impact

Weapons

Why It's Good

Bloodsoaked Ruins

As his signature weapon, Bloodsoaked Ruins has everything Flins needs in a Polearm in Genshin Impact . The 5-star weapon has a high Base ATK alongside a passive effect that greatly increases Flins' Lunar-Charged and Crit DMG. Not only that, but Bloodsoaked Ruins also grants Flins Energy, which notably improves his Elemental Burst casting.

Staff of the Scarlet Sands

Flins greatly benefit from the synergy between Elemental Mastery and ATK% that the Staff of the Scarlet Sands creates. However, the weapon suffers from a low Base ATK, which can negatively affect Flins' DPS. On the other hand, if you manage to build Flins with enough ATK (2000+), Staff of the Scarlet Sands is a decent choice for sure.

Prospector's Shovel

One of the best things about Flins in Genshin Impact is being an F2P-friendly character. One of the main reasons for that is the amount of DMG Flins can deal when using the Prospector's Shovel. The 4-star F2P Polearm increases Flins' ATK% while buffing his Lunar-Charged reactions.

Primordial Jade Winged-Spear

Although there's no reason to get any other weapon beyond Bloodsoaked Ruins and Prospector's Shovel, some weapons, like Primordial Jade Winged-Spear, and Fractured Halo , perform well enough to be mentioned in Flins build in Genshin Impact .

Missive Windspear

Given that Flins and his team will keep triggering Elemental Reactions in Genshin Impact , it's valid to build Flins with Missive Windspear since it will constantly increase his ATK% and Elemental Mastery when he triggers a reaction.

Staff of Homa

Staff of Homa is a universal 5-star weapon that works on every strong DPS in Genshin Impact . That is mainly because of the weapon's ability to work with HP% and ATK% on top of having a Crit DMG Substat.

Vortex Vanquisher

Vortex Vanquisher is not an ideal weapon for Flins, but it's still good enough to make the list. When using Vortex Vanquisher, Flins needs a shielder in his team, as that's what will maximize the passive effect of Vortex Vanquisher.

Dragon's Bane

Dragon's Bane increases Flins' Elemental Mastery while buffing his DMG against enemies affected with Hydro, which is an essential part of Flins' teams and gameplay in Genshin Impact .

Best Flins Artifacts In Genshin Impact

Artifact Set

Why It's Good

Night of the Sky's Unveiling

There's no other artifact set that allows Flins to shine like the Night of the Sky's Unveiling set in Genshin Impact . When building Flins with the Night of the Sky's Unveiling set, he'll get 80 Elemental Mastery from the two-piece set. Additionally, Flins will get up to 30% Crit Rate if his team has another character from Nod-Krai. Finally, Flins and his team will get up to 20% extra DMG on their Lunar reactions, which is extremely useful, given Flins' DMG comes from his Lunar-Charged reactions in Genshin Impact .

Flins Constellations In Genshin Impact

Constellations

Effect

Importance

C1

Part the Veil of Snow

The basic cooldown of the special Elemental Skill Northland Spearstorm is reduced to 4s.

Additionally, when party members trigger Lunar-Charged reactions, Flins will recover 8 Elemental Energy. This effect can occur once every 5.5s.

High

C2

The Devil's Wall

For the next 6s after using the special Elemental Skill Northland Spearstorm, when Flins's next Normal Attack hits an opponent, it will deal an additional 50% of Flins's ATK as AoE Electro DMG. This DMG is considered Lunar-Charged DMG.

Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: While Flins is on the field, after his Electro attacks hit an opponent, that opponent's Electro RES will be decreased by 25% for 7s.

Priority

C4

Night on Bald Mountain

Flins's ATK is increased by 20%.

Additionally, his Ascension Talent "Whispering Flame" is enhanced: Flins's Elemental Mastery is increased by 10% of his ATK. The maximum increase obtainable this way is 220.

Medium

C6

Songs and Dances of Death

The DMG dealt to opponents by Flins's Lunar-Charged reactions is elevated by 35%.

Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: All nearby party members' Lunar-Charged DMG is elevated by 10%.

High

234
9.2 /10
8 /10

item.title: Roblox: Fishing Incremental Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Fishing Incremental is an interesting Roblox experience where you can catch a lot of fish and turn them into different resources. With their help, you will be able to improve your fishing rod and increase the amount of currency you receive. Also, this game has coupons that can provide you with some useful rewards, and in this Roblox guide, we will talk about them. Here we will tell you about Fishing Incremental codes and how to use them.

All Fishing Incremental Codes

Working Fishing Incremental Codes

  • TY2KFAVS â Gives you x3 Rune Potions, x3 Coins Potions, and x3 Fishing Luck Potions.
  • TY700KVISITS â Gives you x2 Rune Potions, x2 Coins Potions, and x2 Fishing Luck Potions.
  • TY5KMEMBERS â Gives you x3 Rune Potions, x3 Coins Potions, and x3 Fishing Luck Potions.

Expired Fishing Incremental Codes

  • TY4KMEMBERS
  • TY1KMEMBERS
  • TY600KVISITS
  • TY300KVISITS
  • TYFOR500CCU
  • TYFOR300CCU
  • SORRYFORBUGS
  • SORRYFORGEMS
  • REVIVED
  • UPDATE1

In Fishing Incremental , you will have to use your fishing rod to farm different fish and sell them for Coins. After that, you will be able to use your money to purchase various upgrades. Promo codes in this game can provide you with valuable potions that will increase your income or improve your chances of catching rarer fish. Use them wisely, and you will quickly unlock new features in this Roblox game.

How to Redeem Fishing Incremental Codes

Codes in Fishing Incremental can help you speed up your progress, and if you want to activate them, you will have to learn how the redemption process works. Fortunately, it is really simple, and you just need to find the right menu. Follow these steps, and you will quickly claim your freebies in Fishing Incremental :

  • Launch Fishing Incremental and wait for this Roblox experience to load.
  • Once you are in the game, click on the chest icon at the bottom of your screen.
  • After that, scroll down to the bottom of the menu that pops up to find the line where you can type codes.
  • Enter the code you want to redeem.
  • Click on the Redeem button.
  • The reward is yours.

How to Get New Fishing Incremental Codes

The developers of Fishing Incremental may add new codes in future patches, and if they do, we will update this guide. Feel free to bookmark our article and use it as a source of information about the latest coupons. Also, you can follow the official media related to Fishing Incremental :

  • Discord Server

item.title: Seven Knights Re:BIRTH Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Seven Knights Re:Birth is a sequel to the popular Seven Knights. It's more accurately described as the same familiar turn-based RPG experience, but with new features, characters, and adventures. As always, you'll have to grind a fair amount to upgrade your units. But you can save time with Seven Knights Re:Birth codes.

The developers release codes to reward players for their activity, as well as during major updates. They reward you with various resources and valuable consumables. Most of them allow you to summon new heroes for your collection.

All Seven Knights Re:Birth Codes

Working Seven Knights Re:Birth Codes

  • SEVENKNIGHTSFOREVER - Redeem this code to get 1 Rare Hero Selector

Expired Seven Knights Re:Birth Codes

  • 7SENASENA7
  • GOODLUCK
  • RINKARMA
  • SENAREGSIK
  • SENARESAMEWAY
  • GUILDWAR
  • SENAREYOUNGLAEGI
  • SENAREMOOVING

Seven Knights Re:Birth features a vast, detailed world that you'll explore during your adventures. Despite the various events and modes, it's still a turn-based RPG, so you won't be able to progress without a good team. You should primarily focus on summoning heroes to assemble teams for various purposes, and then on grinding resources. Even the best units will be useless without upgrading them. Grinding typically takes a significant amount of time, but with Seven Knights Re:Birth codes, you can do it much faster.

Each code contains one or more rewards for this awesome game. These include both currencies and resources for unit upgrades. It's worth noting, however, that codes are active for a limited time, so you'll want to use them as soon as possible.

How to Redeem Seven Knights Re:BIRTH Codes

Now that you know what goodies Seven Knights Re:Birth codes contain, you should know how to get them. This feature works a little confusingly, as the developers haven't added a code redemption option in-game. Instead, you need to visit the Seven Knights Re:BIRTH website. For convenience, you can follow these steps:

  • Launch Seven Knights Re:Birth .
  • Next, complete the tutorial if you haven't already to gain access.
  • Then, go to the Account tab in Settings.
  • After that, copy your UID code.
  • Now, visit the code redemption website.
  • You need to enter your UID code and then the coupon code.
  • Finally, click the Use button to receive your rewards.

If you did everything correctly and the code is still active, the rewards will be sent to your in-game account in Seven Knights Re:Birth . Otherwise, you'll see a message that the code has expired or is invalid.

How to Get More Seven Knights Re:BIRTH Codes

Seven Knights Re:Birth codes are extremely useful for both beginners and experienced players. However, due to their short validity period, they should be used as soon as possible. So check out the developers' official pages, where they post all the codes first:

  • Seven Knights Re:BIRTH Facebook Page
  • Seven Knights Re:BIRTH X Page

Seven Knights Re:Birth is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Roblox: NPC or DIE Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
NPC or DIE offers players a murder mystery-style experience. But instead of hunting other players, you'll play as either the Sheriff or the Criminal. The former must maintain order in the city, while the latter will sabotage it. Using NPC or DIE codes, you can get new gear in a couple of clicks.

Roblox codes will reward you with varying amounts of Cash. Even a few of them are enough to earn you thousands of Cash. However, they're easy to miss due to their short validity period.

All NPC or DIE Codes

Working NPC or DIE Codes

  • NOWAY600K â Redeem code for 650 Cash (NEW)

Expired NPC or DIE Codes

  • 125KLIKES
  • 200KNOWAY
  • 20KLIKES
  • 350KOOL
  • 75THOUSAND
  • 50KREAL
  • NOWAY400K
  • 10KISGREAT
  • 300KYAY
  • RELEASED4REAL
  • 5KNOWAY
  • 100KLIKES
  • 250KNOWAY
  • NOWAY500K
  • 150KLIKES

NPC or DIE perfectly describes the gameplay. Criminal players must complete sabotage quests without being detected by the Sheriffs. Furthermore, you must act like regular NPCs to avoid suspicion. Thus, depending on your assigned role, you will have completely different gameplay, tasks, and abilities. For example, Sheriffs can use ranged weapons to kill Criminals. But be careful, as killing innocents will cost you penalties. Winning rounds will earn you Cash to purchase new equipment. Fortunately, there's an easier way to earn money: using NPC or DIE codes.

Codes are a great source of free money. The developers release them frequently, so you can earn extra Cash with just a few clicks at any time. However, codes expire fairly quickly, after which their rewards become unavailable. So, if you delay using them for too long, you'll miss out on free perks.

How to Redeem NPC or DIE Codes

To redeem NPC or DIE codes, players just need a few clicks. This feature works just like most other Roblox experiences. What's more, you can use it even if you've just joined a game:

  • First, launch the NPC or DIE experience.
  • Next, open Settings. This can only be done in the lobby, so wait until the round ends first.
  • Then enter the code in the appropriate field and click the arrow to claim the rewards.

How to Get More NPC or DIE Codes

If you want to receive NPC or DIE codes as soon as they're released, you should bookmark this guide. We'll update it over time, as we do with our other Roblox codes articles. You can also visit the developer's official social media pages for information about upcoming updates, events, and giveaways:

  • arashiyama Roblox group
  • NPC or DIE Discord server
  • so_norm X page
